HacknetExtension.Name: Core
HacknetExtension.Description: Wake up, agent. It's time to get back to work.
HacknetExtension.WorkshopDescription:
Wake up, agent. It's time to get back to work.
You have been ordered to return to an old hacker group. But why? What could be so important to call you back to work?
Featuring: -A new storyline with new characters -New missions to complete -New music -Around 1 1/2 hours of gameplay
This extension requires you to have Labyrinths installed in order to play.
Created by Kwiper
#HackerJAM
Huge thanks to bobK for making a guide for this extension! http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=969873866
